author: Alicia Adamczyk
title: Should you stress-shop online right now?
description: Order what you need to to find some comfort in these trying times. But more importantly, focus on the bigger issues, like limiting contact with others and supporting workers on the front lines of the coronavirus fight.
content:
For those practicing social distancing from their homes and apartments, having groceries, prepared foods and other essentials delivered can be an important way to flatten the curve and prevent the spread of COVID-19.
